column4: how can I see a list of devices that I can ifconfig ___ down?
ifconfig    will show you all interfaces
so what's the most linux friendly mid-grade audio interface ~$300-$800? anyone?
onboard nvidia audio or realtek here, sound cool to me
i've use lmms on the nvidia
did you MD5 test the file you put on the USB stick?
don't you think you should have?
did you check using MD5 all the files you could so you know they are good
well, this is about the 10th time I've done it ... so ... can I not get 1/10
you could download an infinite number of images and never get a good image
that is certainly how it seems
can boot to live CD and install grub from there
good way to test the next release in alpha without modifying the internal drive ;)
